# How it's going?

### INEDIT
INEDIT demonstrates the potential innovation of .bg-yellow[Social Manufacturing Models creating an Open Innovation] European Do It Together ecosystem for sustainable furniture co-creation
.pull-left-1[

**Furniture sector**

- Interactive tech to unleash .bg-yellow[**creativity**] & .bg-yellow[**co-creation**]

- Open Innovation Platform to democratize the production resources

- Find new business opportunities

- framework for co-creation & distributed production of .bg-yellow[**customer-driven**]

- Lower ecological impact of Manufacturing

- To create an Ecosystem of 'all stakeholders' within EU
